about_the_game:
FEATURES


You've just moved into your new apartment but something spooky is going on! Thankfully you've got the internet to help you. Search Wahoo Answers on your laptop to figure out what's going on and maybe you can be happy in your new place.


EXPLORE YOUR NEW APARTMENT: Unpack and get settled into your new place. But be careful because you may not be alone. (Who are we kidding, you definitely aren’t alone. Watch your back)


SEARCH WAHOO ANSWERS: As inexplicable events start happening in your apartment, you’re going to need answers. Thankfully, you’ve got the friendliness of internet strangers to count on.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: I'm Still Here

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
